description:
A cozy fleece vest that pair perfectly with their favourite hoodie. When it still isn’t jacket season, but they need a little more warmth than a jumper can offer, the Ascend fleece vest has them covered. Made from a thick recycled Sherpa fleece this jacket has a great warmth to weight ratio, and is easy to stuff into a backpack when the sun comes out.

  • Heavyweight high pile recycled sherpa fleece traps warm air, wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • High collar helps stop chilly winds
  • Zippered chest pocket and hand pockets keep must-haves close
  • Curved hemline provides a little more coverage
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: MPG Ascend Girls Sherpa Vest - Girls' - Youths
